item.description:
What Parking Lot?

Just to make sure we all know which lot we're meeting at, it's the top-most lot in the park.  On Foxtown Road, right near Hopyard Road.  Bring your raincoat as well!

Call Fred at 860-227-4027 if you get lost.  Not for better directions, but just for moral support.  :-)

 

 

 

 

We will follow Danielle's suggestion and park by the falls.  I believe she means the parking on Foxton Rd. almost at the intersection of Hopyard Rd.  We have met there in the past.  It is a smaller and out of the way parking lot.  I will not be able to be at this meet up, so if someone nows the trails could they lead the way?  A link to the trail map is below.


Google Maps directions to the lot:
http://maps.google.com/maps?f=d&source=s_d&saddr=&daddr=Foxtown+Rd&hl=en&geocode=Fan-eAIdhymw-w&mra=mr&sll=41.484068,-72.341237&sspn=0.003512,0.006856&ie=UTF8&t=h&z=17

Main Website:
http://www.ct.gov/dep/cwp/view.asp?a=2716&q=325188

Trail Map:
http://www.ct.gov/dep/lib/dep/stateparks/maps/devilshopyard.pdf
item.why: i know dogs are supposed to be on a leash on hiking trails. There are lots of trails here to go hiking on and the dogs would love it too. maybe when it gets a bit warmer we could plan a picnic either before or after.
item.name: Devil's Hopyard State Park
